languages.text: "Как скажете. Но должен предупредить, что внезапные "рукопожатия" равносильны нападению на Арбитес при исполнении — есть контактные яды, способные убить за пару ударов сердца. Так что будьте начеку, Вольный Торговец, такие праздники идеальны для покушений".

traits.locale_text: "Как скажете. Но должен предупредить, что внезапные "рукопожатия" равносильны нападению на Арбитес при исполнении — есть контактные яды, способные убить за пару ударов сердца. Так что будьте начеку, Вольный Торговец, такие праздники идеальны для покушений".

languages.text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."
languages.original_text: "Как скажете. Но должен предупредить, что внезапные "рукопожатия" равносильны нападению на Арбитес при исполнении — есть контактные яды, способные убить за пару ударов сердца. Так что будьте начеку, Вольный Торговец, такие праздники идеальны для покушений".

However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. So be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

"As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. So be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

"As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

"As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

languages.text: “如你所愿。不过，我应该警告你，像刚刚那样突如其来的‘握手’，其实等同于袭击执勤的法务官。因为某些接触类的毒药，可以在转瞬之间夺人性命。要保持警惕，行商浪人，像这样的盛大庆典，是适合暗杀的绝佳机会。”
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: “如你所愿。不过，我应该警告你，像刚刚那样突如其来的‘握手’，其实等同于袭击执勤的法务官。因为某些接触类的毒药，可以在转瞬之间夺人性命。要保持警惕，行商浪人，像这样的盛大庆典，是适合暗杀的绝佳机会。”

languages.text: 「仰せのままに。ただし、ひとつ警告しておきましょう。いきなり『握手』をするような行為は、任務中のアービトレイターに対しては暴行と見なされることがあります。世の中には、数拍の鼓動で命を奪う接触毒も存在するのです。用心してください、ローグトレーダー。こうした祭りは、暗殺にはうってつけの場なのです」
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: 「仰せのままに。ただし、ひとつ警告しておきましょう。いきなり『握手』をするような行為は、任務中のアービトレイターに対しては暴行と見なされることがあります。世の中には、数拍の鼓動で命を奪う接触毒も存在するのです。用心してください、ローグトレーダー。こうした祭りは、暗殺にはうってつけの場なのです」

languages.text: «Como desee. Sin embargo, le advierto que un repentino “apretón de manos” como ese puede considerarse una agresión a un Arbitrator en cumplimiento de su deber; existen venenos de contacto que pueden matar a una persona en un par de latidos. No baje la guardia, Comerciante Independiente; esta clase de festejos constituyen un entorno ideal para cometer un magnicidio».
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: «Como desee. Sin embargo, le advierto que un repentino “apretón de manos” como ese puede considerarse una agresión a un Arbitrator en cumplimiento de su deber; existen venenos de contacto que pueden matar a una persona en un par de latidos. No baje la guardia, Comerciante Independiente; esta clase de festejos constituyen un entorno ideal para cometer un magnicidio».

languages.text: "Nasıl isterseniz. Ancak sizi uyarmalıyım... Bunun gibi ani 'el sıkışmalar', görev başındaki bir Yargıcı'ya saldırmakla eş değer kabul edilir. Birkaç kalp atışı sonrasında canınızdan olabileceğiniz temas zehirleri mevcuttur. Dikkatli olun Hür Tacir. Bunun gibi şenlikler, suikast için ideal ortamlardır."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: "Nasıl isterseniz. Ancak sizi uyarmalıyım... Bunun gibi ani 'el sıkışmalar', görev başındaki bir Yargıcı'ya saldırmakla eş değer kabul edilir. Birkaç kalp atışı sonrasında canınızdan olabileceğiniz temas zehirleri mevcuttur. Dikkatli olun Hür Tacir. Bunun gibi şenlikler, suikast için ideal ortamlardır."

languages.text: « Comme vous le souhaitez. Je dois néanmoins vous prévenir que ces "poignées de mains" soudaines sont considérées comme équivalentes à l'agression d'un arbitrator dans l'exercice de ses fonctions. Il existe des poisons de contact qui peuvent tuer en quelques battements de cœur. Restez sur vos gardes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Les festivités comme celles-ci sont des environnements idéaux pour les assassinats. »
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous le souhaitez. Je dois néanmoins vous prévenir que ces "poignées de mains" soudaines sont considérées comme équivalentes à l'agression d'un arbitrator dans l'exercice de ses fonctions. Il existe des poisons de contact qui peuvent tuer en quelques battements de cœur. Restez sur vos gardes, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Les festivités comme celles-ci sont des environnements idéaux pour les assassinats. »

languages.text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Ich muss Euch allerdings warnen, dass plötzliches 'Händeschütteln' gleichbedeutend mit einem Angriff auf einen Arbitrator in Ausübung seiner Pflicht ist ... es gibt da draußen Kontaktgifte, die Euch binnen weniger Herzschläge töten können. Seid auf der Hut, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}: Feste wie dieses sind wie geschaffen für Mordversuche."
languages.original_text: "As you wish. However, I should warn you that sudden 'handshakes' like that are considered tantamount to assaulting an Arbitrator on duty — there are contact poisons out there that can kill you in a couple of heartbeats. Be on your guard, Rogue Trader: festivals like these are ideal settings for assassinations."

traits.locale_text: "Wie Ihr wünscht. Ich muss Euch allerdings warnen, dass plötzliches 'Händeschütteln' gleichbedeutend mit einem Angriff auf einen Arbitrator in Ausübung seiner Pflicht ist ... es gibt da draußen Kontaktgifte, die Euch binnen weniger Herzschläge töten können. Seid auf der Hut, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}: Feste wie dieses sind wie geschaffen für Mordversuche."
